verses.verse: <S%H1984>Praise<s%> <S%H3050>Yahweh!<s%> <S%H7891>Sing<s%> to <S%H3050>Yahweh<s%> a <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H7892>song,<s%> his <S%H8416>praise<s%> in the <S%H6951>assembly<s%> of the <S%H2623>saints.<s%>
Let <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> in him who <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H1121>them.<s%> Let the children of <S%H6726>Zion<s%> be <S%H1523>joyful<s%> in their <S%H4428>King.<s%>
Let them <S%H1984>praise<s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%> in the <S%H4234>dance!<s%> Let them sing <S%H2167>praises<s%> to him with <S%H8596>tambourine<s%> and <S%H3658>harp!<s%>
For <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> takes <S%H7521>pleasure<s%> in his <S%H5971>people.<s%> He <S%H6286>crowns<s%> the <S%H6035>humble<s%> with <S%H3444>salvation.<s%>
Let the <S%H2623>saints<s%> rejoice in <S%H3519>honor.<s%> Let them sing for <S%H7442>joy<s%> on their <S%H4904>beds.<s%>
May the <S%H7319>high<s%> praises of <S%H410>God<s%> be in their <S%H1627>mouths,<s%> and a <S%H6374>two-edged<s%> <S%H2719>sword<s%> in their <S%H3027>hand;<s%>
To <S%H6213>execute<s%> <S%H5360>vengeance<s%> on the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> and <S%H8433>punishments<s%> on the <S%H3816>peoples;<s%>
To <S%H631>bind<s%> their <S%H4428>kings<s%> with <S%H2131>chains,<s%> and their <S%H3513>nobles<s%> with <S%H3525>fetters<s%> of <S%H1270>iron;<s%>
to <S%H6213>execute<s%> on them the <S%H3789>written<s%> <S%H4941>judgment.<s%> All his <S%H2623>saints<s%> have this <S%H1926>honor.<s%> <S%H1984>Praise<s%> <S%H3050>Yah!<s%>
